description: Star of Persia (Allium cristophii) is an amazing plant with tall, 12-18‚Äù stalks topped with clusters of up to 100 star-shaped purple blooms, making it a magnificent addition to any garden. Its deep, violet flowers offer a beautiful contrast to lighter colored blooms, creating a stunning summer display. Its petals become darker as they mature and are held above strap-like leaves. Star of Persia is a reliable perennial, perfect for likes and landscapes. Plus, it is deer and drought resistant. Its stunning blooms, sturdy growth, and lasting impact make it a must-have for any gardener  looking for something truly special.
